Title: Blood & Money
Writer: Belinda Chayko, Tony Cavanaugh (story), Deborah Cox (head writer), Kerry Greenwood (novel)
Actors: Essie Davis, Nathan Page, Hugo Johnstone-Burt, Ashleigh Cummings
Plot: A street urchin hires Phryne to find his missing brother, leading to a sinister trail of dead boys. Hugh wrestles with career and engagement problems.
